itemDisplayName: CentOS 7.2/6.5 Control M/C with MDADM RAID0 and latest docker native tools
description: This creates configurable number of disks with configurable size for centos. MDADM RAID0 -parameterized and auto with NFS4, parameterized latest docker, docker-compose, docker-machine and with Rancher
summary: A great Control Machine for all Azure Automation Needs with CentOS 7.2/6.5
